Posts.Content: May 13, 2008 08:52PM therese71 wrote: Hi Tammy, I just posted to another discussion, but I am in the same boat-  just received the phone call at 6:58 pm cst tonight-  How old are you?  I am 36 with 2 kids, 4 and 8 years old.  All I know so far is Invasive with positive margins.  I am so scared, scared for me, for my husband, for my kids.
